__e: You're like me, and you make it work.How?

Okay, Mike, you know what I hate more than guys who don't have their shit together?
People around here had a name for it.
I've done the work, and for some reason, these people have given me a show to help you do yours.
Well, they sure got you up and around fast, didn't they?
You know, I honestly think that's why you and Emma didn't work out.
You know,maybe it's better that things didn't work out with ours.
I mean, just because things turned out good for you doesn't make you better than anyone else.
They gave it to a guy, of course, who's been there half the time I have.
Because they gave it to me. I don't know where the baby is!
Don't know why they gave you to my father.
I think he's in the village where this started, but I can't get the brass to listen to me. They think they've had the village bottled up for five days... so no one could've gotten in or out.
If he dies because of whatever you gave him, that's what'll happen.
And you know what they gave him for it?
That's the name they gave to it.
They didn't even give her a chance, man.
No, I mean, it's been designated a tropical storm.
But I've got to fight 15-times harder than any banker or businessman ever born... just to get the chance to do it.
And you know what they gave him for it?
Yeah, but what I'm saying is if I was one of them men who gave up his life, I'd want a name check.

It was the hardest thing I ever did, because-
And my parents said, "Hey, I think there's something that's gonna be going on." And they gave me an inkling of it, but I didn't really know what was going on.
